para.text: In this chapter, the following terms have the meanings indicated.
"CAMA" means the Computer Assisted Mass Appraisal system of the Department.
"Property data" means information that describes the physical characteristics of land or improvements to land.
The Department shall annually compile for public release property data in the CAMA system.
Property data for each county in the CAMA system will be made available in data processing tapes or other forms approved by the Department.
A person may purchase property data for one or more counties by:
Completing a written property data request form; and
Paying the fees specified by the Department.

annotations.annotation: Tax-Property Article, §§2-201 and 14-201, Annotated Code of Maryland
